description.english: Get blasted out of an Emergency Mass Ejector
As Monster, shove an unsuspecting Spaceman (player) into an Emergency Mass Ejector.
As a Spaceman, kill the Monster while it's still in a shapeshifted form.
As Monster, kill 3 Spacemen (players) with Monster Claws, in a single round.
Win a round as the monster, with all Spacemen dead. Must be at least 3 other players in the match.
Kill a Monster who has Posterior Claws, while they're in Monster Form.

displayName.english: WACKY WAVING INFLATABLE ARM FLAILING SPACEMAN

description.english: Trigger an airlock trap with Magnetic Boots.
Drink some non-dairy imitation-dairy chocolate-flavored space milk. And don't ask where it comes from.
Read The Abridged Spaceman's Guide. (Read How To Play Guide)
Create a perk loadout.
Complete the Company's Non-Discriminatory Training Course.
Be the last Spaceman alive, in a game with 5 or more players.
Be the first Spaceman to die, but Spacemen still win the round. (Requires at least 4 other players in the round)
As a Spaceman, steal someone else's keycard.
As a Spaceman, reveal the Monster with a health syringe.
As the Monster, kill a Spaceman with a weapon they were the last owner of. Grenades do not count.
As the Monster, be disguised as someone else's color as they are murdered by their fellow Spacemen. (SECURITY does not count.)
As a Spaceman, kill a disguised Monster from full health with a single blow. The Monster must die before you do.
As a Spaceman, knock the Monster out of shapeshift form with a well-placed Stun Grenade.
As a Spaceman, escape in the Rescue Shuttle.
As a Spaceman, land the killing blow on the Monster
As a Void Beast, kill a Spaceman with your claws.
Become Employee of the Month! (Requires at least 3 other players in the round)
Become Employee of the Month with at least 3000 points. (Requires at least 3 other players in the round)
Reach Wave 5 in Survival Mode.
Reach Wave 10 in Survival Mode.
Reach Wave 15 in Survival Mode.
Survive 5 waves without dying in Survival Mode.
Survive 10 waves without dying in Survival Mode.
Survive 15 waves without dying in Survival Mode.
Shoot the camera in the Bias-Free Gun Range during the Spaceman Tutorial.
Reach Spaceman Rank 2.
Reach Spaceman Rank 5.
Reach Spaceman Rank 10.
Reach Spaceman Rank 20.
Reach Spaceman Rank 30.
In Shapeshifter, as a Spaceman, kill the Monster with any kind of fire.
In Shapeshifter, as the Monster, trap a Spaceman while burrowed.
In Shapeshifter, as the Monster, steal a keycard while burrowed, by using your trap attack.
In Shapeshifter, as the Monster in Monster Form, kill a Spaceman with less than 40 of your Monster health remaining.

displayName.english: By Your Skin of His Teeth

description.english: In Shapeshifter, as a Spaceman, kill the Monster with less than 20 of your health remaining.
You're supposed to stay alive, remember?
In Shapeshifter, as a Spaceman, destroy a Monster's egg.
In Shapeshifter, as the Monster, kill a Spaceman using a parasite.
In Shapeshifter, as the Monster, kill a Spaceman with an Acid Bomb.
In Shapeshifter, as the Monster, kill a Spaceman with a Toxic Ink Cloud.
In Shapeshifter, kill the Monster with a Shotgun.
In Shapeshifter, retrieve a Power Weapon from the canister before anyone else.
In Shapeshifter, shove someone. Because you can.
In Shapeshifter, kill a Void Beast (in Monster Form) with a Railgun.

displayName.english: Do Not Crawl In The Vents

description.english: You never listen.
In Shapeshifter, as a Spaceman, kill the Monster while it's inside the Rescue Shuttle.

displayName.english: The Only Good Bug Is A Dead Bug

description.english: Kill a total of 200 drones in a single level in Co-op or Survival mode. (Any Difficulty)
In Shapeshifter, as the Monster, steal the Rescue Shuttle by destroying the cockpit door.
In Shapeshifter, as the Monster, deploy the Suitcase Nuke while onboard the Rescue Shuttle.
In Shapeshifter, as a Spaceman with the Janitor Perk, end up being the one who kills the Monster.
Complete Chapter 1 of The Crumerian Saga - "Wharfage" on any difficulty.
Complete Chapter 2 of The Crumerian Saga - "The Core Labs" on any difficulty.
Complete any co-op Story Mission on Veteran difficulty.
Complete Chapter 3 of The Crumerian Saga - "The Speaker" on any difficulty.
Complete Chapter 4 of The Crumerian Saga - "Bone World" on any difficulty.
Find the Dopefish in his natural, underwater habitat
Complete the Monster Tutorial
As Monster in Shapeshifter, win a round with at least 3 murders, and without triggering the alarm on a Security Camera.
In Shapeshifter, eat 5 keycards in a single match.
In Shapeshifter, kill a Monster while they're locked into a Health Station.
In Shapeshifter, close a door on yourself, dying in the process. Like a complete fool.
In Shapeshifter, kill a Monster while it's inside a Vent
In Shapeshifter, kill a Monster with a Rocket Launcher
Using the Tram system, visit every station in a single match on Duress.
Make your voice heard by voting in The Tribunal.
Beat Co-op 3 "The Speaker" on Space Madness difficulty.
You were marked as Suspicious in The Tribunal.
Vandalize some Company property.
In a game of 3 or more players, successfully mark the Monster as Suspicious.

displayName.english: Dawn of the Walking Dead Space

description.english: Turn a Spaceman into a Zombie
Unlock a door with VIP keycard
Have your keycard stolen, but you got a spare!

displayName.english: Take One And Call Me In The Morning

description.english: As a Doctor, drop a medkit that someone else uses.
Win a game as an agent of BRIGADE.
As an agent of BRIGADE, give your life for the cause and still win.
As an agent of BRIGADE, hack 20 different objects in a single match.
Drink Space Milk as an agent of BRIGADE.
As an agent of BRIGADE, get killed by the Shapeshifter.
As a Shapeshifter, "accidentally" kill the Traitor.
